name: Get Out Of My Way! (Amin Montazeri)
name_original: Get Out Of My Way! (Amin Montazeri)
description:
💡 This game Made for "Epic Mega Jam 2021" in 7 days
💡 The THEME was «Running out of space»

.

.

Team members:
  • Programming: Ali Badpa, Vahab Ahmadvand
  • Game Design: Vahab Ahmadvand
  • Level design: Amin Montazeri

.

.

Instructions:

  • WASD >>> move
  • Spacebar >>> Jump
  • RMB >>> Slide

.

.

List of contents was created before the jam:

All music are downloaded from https://www.weloveindies.com/en
All characters are downloaded from "Epic free contents" (Paragon)
